labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Rich Presence, Mini, and Regular Profile still shows you are streaming. (Seen on PC and iOS)
data.expected_result: Rich Presence and Viewing Mini/Regular Profile doesn't show you are streaming.
data.short_description: Discord Profile and RP still shows you are streaming even after you stop
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure Streamer Mode is enabled & using OBS - Stream [I streamed for 7 hours when this occurred] - Witness yourself go live on Discord. - After clicking 'Stop Streaming', do NOT exit OBS or turn off Streamer Mode on Discord. - View yourself on Discord.
